JobFullDesc: About the RoleYou will work closely with world-class Engineering teams, Product Managers and Data scientists to build a world-class Search product for Uber across its Rides and Eats divisions.Craft a coherent product vision, strategy, and roadmap for the Search group at Uber.Internalize and deeply understand how Search impacts core Uber business including accurate fare prediction, a growing number of successful trips on the platform, and challenges in emerging markets where there is a lack of places data - and then align your team’s mission and roadmap with this directionExecute. This means being constantly biased towards action, knowing the data, being in the details, setting a high bar and building strong collaborative relationships with other teams, thinking boldly, disambiguating, always thinking of the customer first, and rapidly iterating towards something demonstrably awesome.Vision: Imagine what Search capabilities Uber would need tomorrow across the multitude of its products and services.Drive a cross-functional team to set qualitative objectives and quantitative goals.Basic Qualifications:Minimum 4 years of Product Management experience.Computer science undergraduate degree or equivalent hands-on software engineering experienceFinger-tippiness with data: you just go get the data you need with no muss/fuss and can whip it into an insightful story with no help. You know how to use data to make decisions without getting stuck in analysis paralysis.Preferred Qualifications:2 years of experience building Search related products.Experience in applying Machine Learning / statistical inference technologies to a variety of complex problems.Launching online data and services products.Understanding of big-data processing pipelines (over Hadoop or similar technologies), distributed data stores, and distributed file systemsEntrepreneurial spirit and a thirst for learning.
